lines.text: Don't even think about it! Move a muscle and I'll blow your fucking head clean off!
Da' stupid asshole, think he fuckin' knows a lot!
It was a hologram!
Sure was! Pretty crap one too!
It really gets on my tits that she wouldn't see us face to face.
Yeah, too good to come into close contact with us humans.
So I suppose we follow her orders just like she said.
Sure. No turning back now!
I'm going to investigation.
Huh? You can't be serious! What for?
Cuz, I wanna find this son of a bitch and kill em!
You fuckers! Give me my fucking phone call!
Want to test my aim?
No, you don't you fuckers!
What's wrong?
This case involves a policeman!
Shit! C'mon!
What?
Hello! It's me! Hitomi!
What the hell's going on?
I heard Hitomi in that truck!
What?
Remember, we're looking for a crooked cop!
What? You can't mean Karon! I don't believe it!
We know he thinks Olympus murdered his wife!
Get out of my fucking way!

[while heading for a terrorist attack]
Christ, here we go again. Another glorious day in the city.
At least it beats being a damn traffic cop.
Yeah, I don't know how I'd manage without people shooting at me every day.
